okay well my weekend was awsome!

Friday- I went to the St. Romans dance and it was fun! & of course Jamie was acting like a slut.. haha, and she was putting money down her shirt and making the guys get it .. Ooh, and she was also putting it down her pants sick!
Then after the dance Will, Justin, Sammy J, and Celina all came over and it was so much fun we were wrestling, and just joking around and krap. We watched the movie TEAM AMERICA. That is the best movie ever!   AMERICA-FUCK YAH (JUSTIN) LOL. haha. AND I FEEL LIKE IM ON THE PHONE AND I FEEL (CELINA) haha. that was the best! ME WILL AND SAMMY J, WERE LAUGHING SO HARD. Will & Justin were over till like 4:30 in the morning! lol. and then yah.

Saturday- Me, Sam, and Celina woke up ate some food. and then Sammy J, got picked up and then Celina got picked up and i went home with her and then we went to EDDIE's Graduation party! it was fun. Not alot of people went but it was still a blast. GHOST IN THE GRAVE YARD! haha. HEY LETS BE LIKE JAMIE AND DANCE ON THE POLE! haha. Ooh. and that night Jamie was by Ricky's and was dancing all over the guys! (what a HUGE slut) and she got caught by STEVE. (Ricky's step-dad) haha. what a hoe! Then after EDDIE'S party i went back to Celina's house and slept over! fun! we went to bed right away! haha.

Sunday- I got home from Celina's and then i got a phone call from Stephanie W. (from my neighborhood) So i went over by her house and all her cheerleading friends were over. & they put me up! I WAS SO HIGH UP I COULD HOLD ONTO THE TREE! LOL. thank God they didnt drop me. Then i came home and did nothing! haha.
I want to go tanning outside in the driveway but i dont have a swim suit yet! hehe lol.!   :O)! silly me

     And that was my weekend. I DONT WANT TO GO BACK TO SCHOOL TOMORROW!!! GRR...


 I love him so damn much!        xOx

                                                                   

 Megan

Okay my weekend went like this.-

Friday- Okay after school i went to Rachel's house! then we went to the dance which was so gay because the music was bad! and once we got there i saw Will* and i went up to him to give him a hug, and i got yelled at i was like ok what the hell. and another gay part was that, Will* was only there for an hour. because he had to leave for basketball! lol. but he gave me a kiss* and told me he loved me :O) .. i feel special

Then after the dance Me, Rachel, and her parents went to bugerking!!! YUMMY.. then we went back to her house and ate. and then watched BAD BOYS!* that such a funny movie.. *HAHA*

Saturday- Me and Rachel went to the mall. and did u know that she's my mommy! haha* (insider) that was such a fun time Rachie.. it was so much fun! We met with my mom, and my sister.. that stunk... lol. we looked for a graduation dress- but i didnt find anything.. GRR... then we dropped off Rachel' and then we went to target)) and then PICK n SAVE, haha.. Then that night Celina slept over. :O)* ha lol. - Rachel

Sunday- I went to Celina's house and then to tj's party! it was fun! i got hit in the head with a prestle.! ( is that how u spell it)? well anyways.. moving on. MY FAV SONG IS- I GOT HOES!!! (haha) LOL SAMMY j. AND CELINA!! OMG THAT WAS THE BEST TIME OF MY LIFE.!!!!! (JAMIE) haha... omg that was great! Then i came home from his party and did NOTHING!!. how fun eh`'

Then today school sucked ASS* it was so gay!! it was borning as hell.. LUNCH WAS PRETTY GOOD!

| I LOVE HIM |

TWO MORE DAYS!! TILL -- TWO MONTHS!

     <3 Megan

Okay today my day was borning.. it seemed like it took forever to get out of school... it was so bad! i thought i was going to be in school for like EVER! it was not the greatest feeling in the world. most of my classes were pretty borning.. i didnt realli have any homework except for math, and i had some l.a Block homework.. GRR.. we never get homework in that class, but today we  did.. and i was pissed. we only have to read some story and then answer some questions. but ooh well.. i did it ! and it was easy!

Then once i got home i didnt realli do anything i had some FRUIT LOOPS! hehe lol.. i love them. and then i watched t.v for a lil bit..and then i tried to go outside and play volleyball but it didnt realli work.. because of the wind .. whenever i would hit it.. it would go the other way.. i was mad.. so i just stopped playing it! lol.

 

well imma go because i have nothing else to do.. and im gonna watch AMERICAN IDOL.. i hope Anthony' gets sent home! haha i hate him!!!!!*

 

                       xO i love him Ox

 

                                     

OMG HAHA. THAT IS SUCH A CUTE LIL GIRL!

                                           Megan

Okay today i had science, and then i went to a field trip for L.A Block! it was fun i guess. there were alot of funny moments!! haha ( heather ) haha.. that was so much fun- i cant believe the guys were buying condoms!! omg  haha.. that was great!! and man those girls were HOTT! jk.. they were pretty!

Then once we got back i had general music.. it was pretty borning!! nothing new.

Then i got mc donalds!! yummy :O).. it was soo good!.... Then after that i played a game of vOlleyball with my neighbor (justin) neighbor love! haha lol. then i called Rachel (my love).. * and i talked to her for a bit! & then i went back outside and did NOTHING!... then i called will and i talked to him for about a good 20 minutes and then he had to go.. so then i went back outside and played vOlleyball again! and then he called me again so then i talked to him for like another 20 minutes!!! :O) dont i feel special!* i was talking to him about this weekend!!.. Friday there is a dance! OMG I CANT WAIT! then on Saturday he might come over ! :O).. kiss*kiss! hehe lol...

 

                              Well --- 2*TA*LU

               LATER BITCHES & DIRRTY HOES!

                                 

                                    Megan

 

 

p.s leave those sexy comments*     make me feel cool!

Okay well this morning i woke up at like 8ish. and then i watched THE INCREDIBILES! i love that movie!! its such a cute movie. well Now i just got finished getting ready to go to brunch with my dad's side of the family! Then my dad is picking me and my sister up at 11:30. My sister is going to drive to the place where we are going. & i believe we are going to the Polish Center. the food is realli good! I get to see the whole family today! :O)!!*

  Well after we get back ill prob. spend time with my mommy! :O) ! because i love her so much!!!

HAPPY MOTHERS DAY! *TO ALL THE MOTHERS OUT THERE*


              i love him so very much! xOx.. kisses & hugs


                         Megan*

Okay my well friday- i didnt do nothing. i sat home all day and did nothing ! lol.
Today ( which is saturday)- i woke up took a shower, got ready and then went to stephanie M's house and we went to the mall and then pizza hut! yumm* and then we went to blockbusters and got a video! we had alot of funn times! lol... Way to make those sexy noises from the mouth! lol (insider).. Lol.. Then her dogg would not stop snuffing me! HAHA!.. lol :o) she's a sexy one! (wink wink)
 then once i got home i checked the answering machine and william called me :O) ( yay!)
and this is what he said "hello megan i wanted to see how u were doing.. Ooh and happy mothers day to u kathy even tho. ur not my mom  i just like being over by your house."   isnt that just so sweet!?! I think it is.. *sigh* i love him! 

                   well imma go so ttul  later bitches!!!!

  Megan 

             hes my super man!! haha.

Okay.
 today i had a half day of school. which was pretty fun! the talent show was awsome! Good job to everyone who took part in it! u all did so good! .. :O) great job!!! 
  once i got home i didnt nothing i played volleyball and just hung around the house...

     i love him so much. i realli wanna do sumthing nwith him this weekend!!!! hes such a sweetie.
I might go to the dance tomorrow. prob not tho. so everyone who is going have a lot of fun!

tonight i got to watch the band 3.. I love that show! 

                           Megan*

leave some comments please!!!!!.... :O) make me feel special!

General Music- ate lemon heads and worked on the beatles project! GRR..

then i went on line. I might call Will a bit later idk though, bcuz i heard he has
 Soccer and Basketball! (hes a busy one) lol. Then im going to watch a movie & thats 
about it!

Okay today at school was ok i guess! I wasn't paying attention most of the day! lol. In science we had a sub. and he looked like a geek! haha lol. In Math we did something with CUPS! tomorrow we get ICE CREAM!!! yay! i love ice cream. In l.a block we didnt do anything but Stephanie M, had this thing in her pocket that she kept pressing and it was so funny lol! .. then in study hall that was fun because Me and Kristina were cracking jokes and we sang happy birthday to Jake H.! that was great!!!... Then in Social Studies we got to work all hour. and then tomorrow were doing some group thing idk. Then in L.a block ( again ) we went to the computer lab and man that was borningn because i was finished with everything we were working on! .. Lunch was good. I cant remember what i had though.. oOh. yah i remember now i had PIZZA! lol. 
   Then gym was pretty fun! Kyle kept chucking the ball at ppl, because we were playing kick ball! it was funny i couldn't stop laughing! Then in general Music. Nothing new there it was all borning :O(.. we worked on some project on the beatles! .. then i came home from school!

           Once i got home from school i didnt do anything i came on line right away!
 I have no homework. because i never get any homework which is soo cool! and im happy i have no homework! 
Umm.. i talked to Anthony & Jeff for a bit on line and then they signed off line!

 HAHA. On Thursday we have a half day!!!!!! Hells yah! :O) im so happy .... YES!


P.S durning study hall i saw KF in the hall way! he told me to get back to class so i dont fail 8th grade! but im passing with flying colors!.(dana) 

 Tonight i need to watch Gilmore Girls. and then One tree Hill is on! and then ill prob. Go to bed!
           
Well im going to go and Call William!! ||x3 i love him so much.. Hopefully ill do sumthing with him this weekend! i cant wait!...

            * Love much
                     Megs
